entry.title: EchoLM: Accelerating LLM Serving with Real-time Knowledge Distillation

link.title: EchoLM: Accelerating LLM Serving with Real-time Knowledge Distillation

entry.summary: Large language models (LLMs) have excelled in various applications, yet serving them at scale is challenging due to their substantial resource demands and high latency. Our real-world studies reveal that over 60% of user requests to LLMs have semantically similar counterparts, suggesting the potential for knowledge sharing among requests. However, naively caching and reusing past responses lead...

entry.title: Contextual Agent Security: A Policy for Every Purpose

link.title: Contextual Agent Security: A Policy for Every Purpose

entry.summary: Judging an action’s safety requires knowledge of the context in which the action takes place. To human agents who act in various contexts, this may seem obvious: performing an action such as email deletion may or may not be appropriate depending on the email’s content, the goal (e.g., to erase sensitive emails or to clean up trash), and the type of email address (e.g., work or personal). Unlike...
